message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - javax.persistence.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'javax.persistence.*' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.web.servlet.function.ServerResponse'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.time.LocalDateTime' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.web.servlet.function.ServerResponse'.
Import statement for 'org.springframework.web.servlet.function.RequestPredicates.GET' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Import statement for 'org.springframework.web.servlet.function.RouterFunctions.route' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Import statement for 'org.springframework.web.servlet.function.ServerResponse.*' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.springframework.web.servlet.function.ServerResponse.*.
Top-level class PostRepository has to reside in its own source file.
Top-level class Post has to reside in its own source file.
